de.malkusch.localized.event

Class ReadEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.malkusch.localized.event.AbstractEventListener
      • de.malkusch.localized.event.ReadEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostLoadEventListener

    public class ReadEventListener
extends AbstractEventListener
implements org.hibernate.event.spi.PostLoadEventListener
    Replaces the entity's @Localized fields after loading.
    Since:
    0.2.8
    Author:
    Markus Malkusch
    See Also:

      • onPostLoad

        public void onPostLoad(org.hibernate.event.spi.PostLoadEvent event)

      • handleField

        protected void handleField(org.hibernate.StatelessSession session,
               Field field,
               Object entity,
               LocalizedProperty property)
                    throws LocalizedException
        Description copied from class: AbstractEventListener
        Handles the event for each @Localized field. This method has a separate Session as Hibernate's event system seems to break when using the same Session. The session runs on the same Connection, i.e. in the same transaction.
        Specified by:
        handleField in class AbstractEventListener
        Throws:
        LocalizedException
